mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College Class of 1947: B. Knight, Eugene Ament, William Dulwebber, Bernard J. Brant, Charles Reagan, John Walt, Bernard Kelly, Buford Wells, Robert Buzan, John Collins, G. Gaia, G. Howard, Louis Sampson, William Carroll, Albert Torri, Edwin Swint, Frank Saino, John Hora, Robert Marshall
